#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s1,s2;
    int t;
    map<char,int>mp,mp1;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        mp.clear();
        mp1.clear();
        int flag=1;
        cin>>s1>>s2;
        for(int i=0;i<s1.length();i++)
        {
            mp[s1[i]]++;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<s2.length();i++)
        {
            mp1[s2[i]]++;
        }
        for(int i=97;i<=122;i++)
        {
            //cout<<mp[char(i)]<<" "<<mp1[char(i)]<<endl;
            if(mp[char(i)]!=mp1[char(i)])
            {
                flag=0;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==0)cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
        else cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
    }
}
